lyrics:
Dear lie,
You suck
You said you could fix anything
Instead
I'm Fucked
You made things even worse for me
If I had Balls
I'd tell you "Get away from me"
Guess I'm not smart
I let you unnerve me
I let you control me
Afraid the truth would hurt me
When it's you that hurts me
More

*Chrous*
Get out of my mouth
Get out of my head
Get out of my mind
Stop putting words in my head
Get out of my mouth
You're nothin' but trouble
Get out of my life
Get outta me
Outta me ( Outta me)
Outta me (Outta me)
Lie
Lie
Lie
Lie
Lie
Lie

Dear lie,
You're dumb
You think you've got the best of me
You think
You've won
Misread my vulnerability
I've got your Balls
Now get the hell away from me
I've learned
Your heart
Won't let you unnerve me
Won't let you control me
The truth will only free me
And your lies won't hurt
No
No more

*Chrous*
Get out of my mouth (Get out of my mouth)
Get out of my head (Get out of my head)
Get out of my mind
stop putting words in my head
Get out of my mouth
you're nothin' but trouble
Get out of my life
Get outta me
Outta me ( Outta me)
Outta me (Outta me)
Lie

Lie
Lie
Lie
Lie

I've got (I've got...)
Your Balls (Your Balls...)
Now get the hell away from me
I've learned (I've learned...)
Your heart (Your heart...)
Won't let you unnerve me
Won't let you control me
The truth will only free me
And your lies won't hurt
No
No more
